About.title: About Me
About.content:
I'm Fermín, a Freelance Software Developer with a passion for web accessibility working from La Paloma, Uruguay 🏖️

Most of my experience is in web development working on both simple projects like landing pages and complex ones like web apps, e-commerce sites, blogs, games, etc.

I've worked both alone and with teams for different companies, and I have plenty of experience working remotely 👨‍💻

I speak Spanish 🇪🇸 English 🇬🇧 and Italian 🇮🇹 and some French 🇫🇷 and Portuguese 🇧🇷

Keep scrolling to learn more about what kind of projects I'm working on 🚀 some of my client work and the technolgies I'm familiar with 🛸

projects.busesuy: A search engine for medium & long distance bus lines in Uruguay that can calculate transfer trips. First of its kind in the country.
projects.arbolado: An interactive web tool for exploring data gathered from different census about trees in different cities' streets.
projects.papelapp: A web app for figuring out the cost per meter of toilet paper rolls.
projects.ecouter: A web app for language teachers and students to access the accompanying audio tracks from their text books with ease.
projects.crabe: A two player remote web game based on the board game "La Marche Du Crabe"
projects.salam: A Shopify store theme develop from scratch custom built for a client.
projects.grigadale: A web site built to publish the full collection of trees from a private abrobretum. With an intuitive interace, an interactive map and a blog section.
projects.angular: A custom e-commerce site made to sell templates for developers working with the Angular framework.
projects.ionic: A custom e-commerce site made to sell templates for developers working with the Ionic framework.
projects.atlantico: A business web site developed for a real estate development company.
projects.pipina: A web site for a brand that develops games to help kids with writing and/or reading dificulties.
